title: Furnace Repair Businesses Endure Long Winter of Parts Shortages
sub_head: High demand, climbing prices and backlogged inventories lead climate-control servicers to find expensive workarounds and rethink supplier relationships
body:
In a winter beset by supply-chain snarls, furnace maintenance companies said it can be a struggle to keep the heat on.
Heating and cooling servicers said they are facing record backlogs, longer wait times and rising prices for parts and equipment as manufacturing issues and high consumer demand persist through one of the industryâ€™s busiest times of year.
